analysis.key_quote: This measure would upend the merit-based foundations of the U.S. civil service, erode essential safeguards against political interference, and run counter to more than a century of legal precedent and public policy.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its potential to undermine merit-based systems, due process rights, and the integrity of the civil service, indicating a clear stance against politicization.
